actions.description: The spirit makes a number of attacks equal to half this spell's level (rounded down)
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1d8 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage, and the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw against your spell save DC or be frightened of the undead until the end of the target's next turn
actions.name: Deathly Touch (Ghostly only)

actions.description: Ranged Spell Attack: your spell attack modifier to hit, range 150 ft., one target. Hit: 2d4 + 3 + the spell's level necrotic damage
actions.name: Grave Bolt (Skeletal only)

actions.description: Your spell attack modifier to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6 + 3 + the spell's level slashing damage. If the target is poisoned, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC be paralyzed until the end of its next turn
actions.name: Rotting Claw (Putrid only)

languages: understands the languages its summoner speaks
name: Undead Spirit

specialTraits.description: Any creature, other than you, that starts its turn within 5 feet of the spirit must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC or be poisoned until the start of its next turn
specialTraits.name: Festering Aura (Putrid only)

specialTraits.description: The spirit can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. If it ends its turn inside an object, it is shunted to the nearest unoccupied space and takes 1d10 force damage for every 5 feet traveled
specialTraits.name: Incorporeal Passage (Ghostly only)
